6754      this.manualTimeUpdatesOff();
6755    });
6756  };
6757  
6758  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.manualTimeUpdatesOff = function(){
6759    var player = this.player_;
6760  
6761    this.manualTimeUpdates = false;
6762    this.stopTrackingCurrentTime();
6763    this.off(player, 'play', this.trackCurrentTime);
6764    this.off(player, 'pause', this.stopTrackingCurrentTime);
6765  };
6766  
6767  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.trackCurrentTime = function(){
6768    if (this.currentTimeInterval) { this.stopTrackingCurrentTime(); }
6769    this.currentTimeInterval = this.setInterval(function(){
6770      this.player().trigger('timeupdate');
6771    }, 250); // 42 = 24 fps // 250 is what Webkit uses // FF uses 15
6772  };
6773  
6774  // Turn off play progress tracking (when paused or dragging)
6775  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.stopTrackingCurrentTime = function(){
6776    this.clearInterval(this.currentTimeInterval);
6777  
6778    // #1002 - if the video ends right before the next timeupdate would happen,
6779    // the progress bar won't make it all the way to the end
6780    this.player().trigger('timeupdate');
6781  };
6782  
6783  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.dispose = function() {
6784    // Turn off any manual progress or timeupdate tracking
6785    if (this.manualProgress) { this.manualProgressOff(); }
6786  
6787    if (this.manualTimeUpdates) { this.manualTimeUpdatesOff(); }
6788  
6789    vjs.Component.prototype.dispose.call(this);
6790  };
6791  
6792  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.setCurrentTime = function() {
6793    // improve the accuracy of manual timeupdates
6794    if (this.manualTimeUpdates) { this.player().trigger('timeupdate'); }
6795  };
6796  
6797  // TODO: Consider looking at moving this into the text track display directly
6798  // https://github.com/videojs/video.js/issues/1863
6799  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.initTextTrackListeners = function() {
6800    var player = this.player_,
6801        tracks,
6802        textTrackListChanges = function() {
6803          var textTrackDisplay = player.getChild('textTrackDisplay'),
6804              controlBar;
6805  
6806          if (textTrackDisplay) {
6807            textTrackDisplay.updateDisplay();
6808          }
6809        };
6810  
6811    tracks = this.textTracks();
6812  
6813    if (!tracks) {
6814      return;
6815    }
6816  
6817    tracks.addEventListener('removetrack', textTrackListChanges);
6818    tracks.addEventListener('addtrack', textTrackListChanges);
6819  
6820    this.on('dispose', vjs.bind(this, function() {
6821      tracks.removeEventListener('removetrack', textTrackListChanges);
6822      tracks.removeEventListener('addtrack', textTrackListChanges);
6823    }));
6824  };
6825  
6826  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.emulateTextTracks = function() {
6827    var player = this.player_,
6828        textTracksChanges,
6829        tracks,
6830        script;
6831  
6832    if (!window['WebVTT']) {
6833      script = document.createElement('script');
6834      script.src = player.options()['vtt.js'] || '../node_modules/vtt.js/dist/vtt.js';
6835      player.el().appendChild(script);
6836      window['WebVTT'] = true;
6837    }
6838  
6839    tracks = this.textTracks();
6840    if (!tracks) {
6841      return;
6842    }
6843  
6844    textTracksChanges = function() {
6845      var i, track, textTrackDisplay;
6846  
6847      textTrackDisplay = player.getChild('textTrackDisplay'),
6848  
6849      textTrackDisplay.updateDisplay();
6850  
6851      for (i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
6852        track = this[i];
6853        track.removeEventListener('cuechange', vjs.bind(textTrackDisplay, textTrackDisplay.updateDisplay));
6854        if (track.mode === 'showing') {
6855          track.addEventListener('cuechange', vjs.bind(textTrackDisplay, textTrackDisplay.updateDisplay));
6856        }
6857      }
6858    };
6859  
6860    tracks.addEventListener('change', textTracksChanges);
6861  
6862    this.on('dispose', vjs.bind(this, function() {
6863      tracks.removeEventListener('change', textTracksChanges);
6864    }));
6865  };
6866  
6867  /**
6868   * Provide default methods for text tracks.
6869   *
6870   * Html5 tech overrides these.
6871   */
6872  
6873  /**
6874   * List of associated text tracks
6875   * @type {Array}
6876   * @private
6877   */
6878  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.textTracks_;
6879  
6880  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.textTracks = function() {
6881    this.textTracks_ = this.textTracks_ || new vjs.TextTrackList();
6882    return this.textTracks_;
6883  };
6884  
6885  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.remoteTextTracks = function() {
6886    this.remoteTextTracks_ = this.remoteTextTracks_ || new vjs.TextTrackList();
6887    return this.remoteTextTracks_;
6888  };
6889  
6890  createTrackHelper = function(self, kind, label, language, options) {
6891    var tracks = self.textTracks(),
6892        track;
6893  
6894    options = options || {};
6895  
6896    options['kind'] = kind;
6897    if (label) {
6898      options['label'] = label;
6899    }
6900    if (language) {
6901      options['language'] = language;
6902    }
6903    options['player'] = self.player_;
6904  
6905    track = new vjs.TextTrack(options);
6906    tracks.addTrack_(track);
6907  
6908    return track;
6909  };
6910  
6911  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.addTextTrack = function(kind, label, language) {
6912    if (!kind) {
6913      throw new Error('TextTrack kind is required but was not provided');
6914    }
6915  
6916    return createTrackHelper(this, kind, label, language);
6917  };
6918  
6919  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.addRemoteTextTrack = function(options) {
6920    var track = createTrackHelper(this, options['kind'], options['label'], options['language'], options);
6921    this.remoteTextTracks().addTrack_(track);
6922    return {
6923      track: track
6924    };
6925  };
6926  
6927  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.removeRemoteTextTrack = function(track) {
6928    this.textTracks().removeTrack_(track);
6929    this.remoteTextTracks().removeTrack_(track);
6930  };
6931  
6932  /**
6933   * Provide a default setPoster method for techs
6934   *
6935   * Poster support for techs should be optional, so we don't want techs to
6936   * break if they don't have a way to set a poster.
6937   */
6938  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.setPoster = function(){};
6939  
6940  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype['featuresVolumeControl'] = true;
6941  
6942  // Resizing plugins using request fullscreen reloads the plugin
6943  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype['featuresFullscreenResize'] = false;
6944  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype['featuresPlaybackRate'] = false;
6945  
6946  // Optional events that we can manually mimic with timers
6947  // currently not triggered by video-js-swf
6948  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype['featuresProgressEvents'] = false;
6949  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype['featuresTimeupdateEvents'] = false;
6950  
6951  vjs.MediaTechController.prototype['featuresNativeTextTracks'] = false;
6952  
6953  /**
6954   * A functional mixin for techs that want to use the Source Handler pattern.
6955   *
6956   * ##### EXAMPLE:
6957   *
6958   *   videojs.MediaTechController.withSourceHandlers.call(MyTech);
6959   *
6960   */
6961  vjs.MediaTechController.withSourceHandlers = function(Tech){
6962    /**
6963     * Register a source handler
6964     * Source handlers are scripts for handling specific formats.
6965     * The source handler pattern is used for adaptive formats (HLS, DASH) that
6966     * manually load video data and feed it into a Source Buffer (Media Source Extensions)
6967     * @param  {Function} handler  The source handler
6968     * @param  {Boolean}  first    Register it before any existing handlers
6969     */
6970    Tech.registerSourceHandler = function(handler, index){
6971      var handlers = Tech.sourceHandlers;
6972  
6973      if (!handlers) {
6974        handlers = Tech.sourceHandlers = [];
6975      }
6976  
6977      if (index === undefined) {
6978        // add to the end of the list
6979        index = handlers.length;
6980      }
6981  
6982      handlers.splice(index, 0, handler);
6983    };
6984  
6985    /**
6986     * Return the first source handler that supports the source
6987     * TODO: Answer question: should 'probably' be prioritized over 'maybe'
6988     * @param  {Object} source The source object
6989     * @returns {Object}       The first source handler that supports the source
6990     * @returns {null}         Null if no source handler is found
6991     */
6992    Tech.selectSourceHandler = function(source){
6993      var handlers = Tech.sourceHandlers || [],
6994          can;
6995  
6996      for (var i = 0; i < handlers.length; i++) {
6997        can = handlers[i].canHandleSource(source);
6998  
6999        if (can) {
7000          return handlers[i];
7001        }
7002      }
7003  
7004      return null;
7005    };
7006  
7007    /**
7008    * Check if the tech can support the given source
7009    * @param  {Object} srcObj  The source object
7010    * @return {String}         'probably', 'maybe', or '' (empty string)
7011    */
7012    Tech.canPlaySource = function(srcObj){
7013      var sh = Tech.selectSourceHandler(srcObj);
7014  
7015      if (sh) {
7016        return sh.canHandleSource(srcObj);
7017      }
7018  
7019      return '';
7020    };
7021  
7022    /**
7023     * Create a function for setting the source using a source object
7024     * and source handlers.
7025     * Should never be called unless a source handler was found.
7026     * @param {Object} source  A source object with src and type keys
7027     * @return {vjs.MediaTechController} self
7028     */
7029    Tech.prototype.setSource = function(source){
7030      var sh = Tech.selectSourceHandler(source);
7031  
7032      // Dispose any existing source handler
7033      this.disposeSourceHandler();
7034      this.off('dispose', this.disposeSourceHandler);
7035  
7036      this.currentSource_ = source;
7037      this.sourceHandler_ = sh.handleSource(source, this);
7038      this.on('dispose', this.disposeSourceHandler);
7039  
7040      return this;
7041    };
7042  
7043    /**
7044     * Clean up any existing source handler
7045     */
7046    Tech.prototype.disposeSourceHandler = function(){
7047      if (this.sourceHandler_ && this.sourceHandler_.dispose) {
7048        this.sourceHandler_.dispose();
7049      }
7050    };
7051  
7052  };
7053  
7054  vjs.media = {};
7055  
7056  })();
7057  /**
7058   * @fileoverview HTML5 Media Controller - Wrapper for HTML5 Media API
7059   */
7060  
7061  /**
7062   * HTML5 Media Controller - Wrapper for HTML5 Media API
7063   * @param {vjs.Player|Object} player
7064   * @param {Object=} options
7065   * @param {Function=} ready
7066   * @constructor
7067   */
7068  vjs.Html5 = vjs.MediaTechController.extend({
7069    /** @constructor */
7070    init: function(player, options, ready){
7071      var  nodes, nodesLength, i, node, nodeName, removeNodes;
7072  
7073      if (options['nativeCaptions'] === false || options['nativeTextTracks'] === false) {
7074        this['featuresNativeTextTracks'] = false;
7075      }
7076  
7077      vjs.MediaTechController.call(this, player, options, ready);
7078  
7079      this.setupTriggers();
7080  
7081      var source = options['source'];
7082  
7083      // Set the source if one is provided
7084      // 1) Check if the source is new (if not, we want to keep the original so playback isn't interrupted)
7085      // 2) Check to see if the network state of the tag was failed at init, and if so, reset the source
7086      // anyway so the error gets fired.
7087      if (source && (this.el_.currentSrc !== source.src || (player.tag && player.tag.initNetworkState_ === 3))) {
7088        this.setSource(source);
7089      }
7090  
7091      if (this.el_.hasChildNodes()) {
7092  
7093        nodes = this.el_.childNodes;
7094        nodesLength = nodes.length;
7095        removeNodes = [];
7096  
7097        while (nodesLength--) {
7098          node = nodes[nodesLength];
7099          nodeName = node.nodeName.toLowerCase();
7100          if (nodeName === 'track') {
7101            if (!this['featuresNativeTextTracks']) {
7102              // Empty video tag tracks so the built-in player doesn't use them also.
7103              // This may not be fast enough to stop HTML5 browsers from reading the tags
7104              // so we'll need to turn off any default tracks if we're manually doing
7105              // captions and subtitles. videoElement.textTracks
7106              removeNodes.push(node);
7107            } else {
7108              this.remoteTextTracks().addTrack_(node['track']);
7109            }
7110          }
7111        }
7112  
7113        for (i=0; i<removeNodes.length; i++) {
7114          this.el_.removeChild(removeNodes[i]);
7115        }
7116      }
7117  
7118      if (this['featuresNativeTextTracks']) {
7119        this.on('loadstart', vjs.bind(this, this.hideCaptions));
7120      }
7121  
7122      // Determine if native controls should be used
7123      // Our goal should be to get the custom controls on mobile solid everywhere
7124      // so we can remove this all together. Right now this will block custom
7125      // controls on touch enabled laptops like the Chrome Pixel
7126      if (vjs.TOUCH_ENABLED && player.options()['nativeControlsForTouch'] === true) {
7127        this.useNativeControls();
7128      }
7129  
7130      // Chrome and Safari both have issues with autoplay.
7131      // In Safari (5.1.1), when we move the video element into the container div, autoplay doesn't work.
7132      // In Chrome (15), if you have autoplay + a poster + no controls, the video gets hidden (but audio plays)
7133      // This fixes both issues. Need to wait for API, so it updates displays correctly
7134      player.ready(function(){
7135        if (this.tag && this.options_['autoplay'] && this.paused()) {
7136          delete this.tag['poster']; // Chrome Fix. Fixed in Chrome v16.
7137          this.play();
7138        }
7139      });
7140  
7141      this.triggerReady();
7142    }
7143  });
7144  
7145  vjs.Html5.prototype.dispose = function(){
7146    vjs.Html5.disposeMediaElement(this.el_);
7147    vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.dispose.call(this);
7148  };
7149  
7150  vjs.Html5.prototype.createEl = function(){
7151    var player = this.player_,
7152        track,
7153        trackEl,
7154        i,
7155        // If possible, reuse original tag for HTML5 playback technology element
7156        el = player.tag,
7157        attributes,
7158        newEl,
7159        clone;
7160  
7161    // Check if this browser supports moving the element into the box.
7162    // On the iPhone video will break if you move the element,
7163    // So we have to create a brand new element.
7164    if (!el || this['movingMediaElementInDOM'] === false) {
7165  
7166      // If the original tag is still there, clone and remove it.
7167      if (el) {
7168        clone = el.cloneNode(false);
7169        vjs.Html5.disposeMediaElement(el);
7170        el = clone;
7171        player.tag = null;
7172      } else {
7173        el = vjs.createEl('video');
7174  
7175        // determine if native controls should be used
7176        attributes = videojs.util.mergeOptions({}, player.tagAttributes);
7177        if (!vjs.TOUCH_ENABLED || player.options()['nativeControlsForTouch'] !== true) {
7178          delete attributes.controls;
7179        }
7180  
7181        vjs.setElementAttributes(el,
7182          vjs.obj.merge(attributes, {
7183            id:player.id() + '_html5_api',
7184            'class':'vjs-tech'
7185          })
7186        );
7187      }
7188      // associate the player with the new tag
7189      el['player'] = player;
7190  
7191      if (player.options_.tracks) {
7192        for (i = 0; i < player.options_.tracks.length; i++) {
7193          track = player.options_.tracks[i];
7194          trackEl = document.createElement('track');
7195          trackEl.kind = track.kind;
7196          trackEl.label = track.label;
7197          trackEl.srclang = track.srclang;
7198          trackEl.src = track.src;
7199          if ('default' in track) {
7200            trackEl.setAttribute('default', 'default');
7201          }
7202          el.appendChild(trackEl);
7203        }
7204      }
7205  
7206      vjs.insertFirst(el, player.el());
7207    }
7208  
7209    // Update specific tag settings, in case they were overridden
7210    var settingsAttrs = ['autoplay','preload','loop','muted'];
7211    for (i = settingsAttrs.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
7212      var attr = settingsAttrs[i];
7213      var overwriteAttrs = {};
7214      if (typeof player.options_[attr] !== 'undefined') {
7215        overwriteAttrs[attr] = player.options_[attr];
7216      }
7217      vjs.setElementAttributes(el, overwriteAttrs);
7218    }
7219  
7220    return el;
7221    // jenniisawesome = true;
7222  };
7223  
7224  
7225  vjs.Html5.prototype.hideCaptions = function() {
7226    var tracks = this.el_.textTracks,
7227        track,
7228        i = tracks.length,
7229        kinds = {
7230          'captions': 1,
7231          'subtitles': 1
7232        };
7233  
7234    while (i--) {
7235      track = tracks[i];
7236      if (track && track['kind'] in kinds) {
7237        track.mode = 'disabled';
7238      }
7239    }
7240  };
7241  
7242  // Make video events trigger player events
7243  // May seem verbose here, but makes other APIs possible.
7244  // Triggers removed using this.off when disposed
7245  vjs.Html5.prototype.setupTriggers = function(){
7246    for (var i = vjs.Html5.Events.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
7247      this.on(vjs.Html5.Events[i], this.eventHandler);
7248    }
7249  };
7250  
7251  vjs.Html5.prototype.eventHandler = function(evt){
7252    // In the case of an error on the video element, set the error prop
7253    // on the player and let the player handle triggering the event. On
7254    // some platforms, error events fire that do not cause the error
7255    // property on the video element to be set. See #1465 for an example.
7256    if (evt.type == 'error' && this.error()) {
7257      this.player().error(this.error().code);
7258  
7259    // in some cases we pass the event directly to the player
7260    } else {
7261      // No need for media events to bubble up.
7262      evt.bubbles = false;
7263  
7264      this.player().trigger(evt);
7265    }
7266  };
7267  
7268  vjs.Html5.prototype.useNativeControls = function(){
7269    var tech, player, controlsOn, controlsOff, cleanUp;
7270  
7271    tech = this;
7272    player = this.player();
7273  
7274    // If the player controls are enabled turn on the native controls
7275    tech.setControls(player.controls());
7276  
7277    // Update the native controls when player controls state is updated
7278    controlsOn = function(){
7279      tech.setControls(true);
7280    };
7281    controlsOff = function(){
7282      tech.setControls(false);
7283    };
7284    player.on('controlsenabled', controlsOn);
7285    player.on('controlsdisabled', controlsOff);
7286  
7287    // Clean up when not using native controls anymore
7288    cleanUp = function(){
7289      player.off('controlsenabled', controlsOn);
7290      player.off('controlsdisabled', controlsOff);
7291    };
7292    tech.on('dispose', cleanUp);
7293    player.on('usingcustomcontrols', cleanUp);
7294  
7295    // Update the state of the player to using native controls
7296    player.usingNativeControls(true);
7297  };
7298  
7299  
7300  vjs.Html5.prototype.play = function(){ this.el_.play(); };
7301  vjs.Html5.prototype.pause = function(){ this.el_.pause(); };
7302  vjs.Html5.prototype.paused = function(){ return this.el_.paused; };
7303  
7304  vjs.Html5.prototype.currentTime = function(){ return this.el_.currentTime; };
7305  vjs.Html5.prototype.setCurrentTime = function(seconds){
7306    try {
7307      this.el_.currentTime = seconds;
7308    } catch(e) {
7309      vjs.log(e, 'Video is not ready. (Video.js)');
7310      // this.warning(VideoJS.warnings.videoNotReady);
7311    }
7312  };
7313  
7314  vjs.Html5.prototype.duration = function(){ return this.el_.duration || 0; };
7315  vjs.Html5.prototype.buffered = function(){ return this.el_.buffered; };
7316  
7317  vjs.Html5.prototype.volume = function(){ return this.el_.volume; };
7318  vjs.Html5.prototype.setVolume = function(percentAsDecimal){ this.el_.volume = percentAsDecimal; };
7319  vjs.Html5.prototype.muted = function(){ return this.el_.muted; };
7320  vjs.Html5.prototype.setMuted = function(muted){ this.el_.muted = muted; };
7321  
7322  vjs.Html5.prototype.width = function(){ return this.el_.offsetWidth; };
7323  vjs.Html5.prototype.height = function(){ return this.el_.offsetHeight; };
7324  
7325  vjs.Html5.prototype.supportsFullScreen = function(){
7326    if (typeof this.el_.webkitEnterFullScreen == 'function') {
7327  
7328      // Seems to be broken in Chromium/Chrome && Safari in Leopard
7329      if (/Android/.test(vjs.USER_AGENT) || !/Chrome|Mac OS X 10.5/.test(vjs.USER_AGENT)) {
7330        return true;
7331      }
7332    }
7333    return false;
7334  };
7335  
7336  vjs.Html5.prototype.enterFullScreen = function(){
7337    var video = this.el_;
7338  
7339    if ('webkitDisplayingFullscreen' in video) {
7340      this.one('webkitbeginfullscreen', function() {
7341        this.player_.isFullscreen(true);
7342  
7343        this.one('webkitendfullscreen', function() {
7344          this.player_.isFullscreen(false);
7345          this.player_.trigger('fullscreenchange');
7346        });
7347  
7348        this.player_.trigger('fullscreenchange');
7349      });
7350    }
7351  
7352    if (video.paused && video.networkState <= video.HAVE_METADATA) {
7353      // attempt to prime the video element for programmatic access
7354      // this isn't necessary on the desktop but shouldn't hurt
7355      this.el_.play();
7356  
7357      // playing and pausing synchronously during the transition to fullscreen
7358      // can get iOS ~6.1 devices into a play/pause loop
7359      this.setTimeout(function(){
7360        video.pause();
7361        video.webkitEnterFullScreen();
7362      }, 0);
7363    } else {
7364      video.webkitEnterFullScreen();
7365    }
7366  };
7367  
7368  vjs.Html5.prototype.exitFullScreen = function(){
7369    this.el_.webkitExitFullScreen();
7370  };
7371  
7372  
7373  vjs.Html5.prototype.src = function(src) {
7374    if (src === undefined) {
7375      return this.el_.src;
7376    } else {
7377      // Setting src through `src` instead of `setSrc` will be deprecated
7378      this.setSrc(src);
7379    }
7380  };
7381  
7382  vjs.Html5.prototype.setSrc = function(src) {
7383    this.el_.src = src;
7384  };
7385  
7386  vjs.Html5.prototype.load = function(){ this.el_.load(); };
7387  vjs.Html5.prototype.currentSrc = function(){ return this.el_.currentSrc; };
7388  
7389  vjs.Html5.prototype.poster = function(){ return this.el_.poster; };
7390  vjs.Html5.prototype.setPoster = function(val){ this.el_.poster = val; };
7391  
7392  vjs.Html5.prototype.preload = function(){ return this.el_.preload; };
7393  vjs.Html5.prototype.setPreload = function(val){ this.el_.preload = val; };
7394  
7395  vjs.Html5.prototype.autoplay = function(){ return this.el_.autoplay; };
7396  vjs.Html5.prototype.setAutoplay = function(val){ this.el_.autoplay = val; };
7397  
7398  vjs.Html5.prototype.controls = function(){ return this.el_.controls; };
7399  vjs.Html5.prototype.setControls = function(val){ this.el_.controls = !!val; };
7400  
7401  vjs.Html5.prototype.loop = function(){ return this.el_.loop; };
7402  vjs.Html5.prototype.setLoop = function(val){ this.el_.loop = val; };
7403  
7404  vjs.Html5.prototype.error = function(){ return this.el_.error; };
7405  vjs.Html5.prototype.seeking = function(){ return this.el_.seeking; };
7406  vjs.Html5.prototype.ended = function(){ return this.el_.ended; };
7407  vjs.Html5.prototype.defaultMuted = function(){ return this.el_.defaultMuted; };
7408  
7409  vjs.Html5.prototype.playbackRate = function(){ return this.el_.playbackRate; };
7410  vjs.Html5.prototype.setPlaybackRate = function(val){ this.el_.playbackRate = val; };
7411  
7412  vjs.Html5.prototype.networkState = function(){ return this.el_.networkState; };
7413  vjs.Html5.prototype.readyState = function(){ return this.el_.readyState; };
7414  
7415  vjs.Html5.prototype.textTracks = function() {
7416    if (!this['featuresNativeTextTracks']) {
7417      return vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.textTracks.call(this);
7418    }
7419  
7420    return this.el_.textTracks;
7421  };
7422  vjs.Html5.prototype.addTextTrack = function(kind, label, language) {
7423    if (!this['featuresNativeTextTracks']) {
7424      return vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.addTextTrack.call(this, kind, label, language);
7425    }
7426  
7427    return this.el_.addTextTrack(kind, label, language);
7428  };
7429  
7430  vjs.Html5.prototype.addRemoteTextTrack = function(options) {
7431    if (!this['featuresNativeTextTracks']) {
7432      return vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.addRemoteTextTrack.call(this, options);
7433    }
7434  
7435    var track = document.createElement('track');
7436    options = options || {};
7437  
7438    if (options['kind']) {
7439      track['kind'] = options['kind'];
7440    }
7441    if (options['label']) {
7442      track['label'] = options['label'];
7443    }
7444    if (options['language'] || options['srclang']) {
7445      track['srclang'] = options['language'] || options['srclang'];
7446    }
7447    if (options['default']) {
7448      track['default'] = options['default'];
7449    }
7450    if (options['id']) {
7451      track['id'] = options['id'];
7452    }
7453    if (options['src']) {
7454      track['src'] = options['src'];
7455    }
7456  
7457    this.el().appendChild(track);
7458  
7459    if (track.track['kind'] === 'metadata') {
7460      track['track']['mode'] = 'hidden';
7461    } else {
7462      track['track']['mode'] = 'disabled';
7463    }
7464  
7465    track['onload'] = function() {
7466      var tt = track['track'];
7467      if (track.readyState >= 2) {
7468        if (tt['kind'] === 'metadata' && tt['mode'] !== 'hidden') {
7469          tt['mode'] = 'hidden';
7470        } else if (tt['kind'] !== 'metadata' && tt['mode'] !== 'disabled') {
7471          tt['mode'] = 'disabled';
7472        }
7473        track['onload'] = null;
7474      }
7475    };
7476  
7477    this.remoteTextTracks().addTrack_(track.track);
7478  
7479    return track;
7480  };
7481  
7482  vjs.Html5.prototype.removeRemoteTextTrack = function(track) {
7483    if (!this['featuresNativeTextTracks']) {
7484      return vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.removeRemoteTextTrack.call(this, track);
7485    }
7486  
7487    var tracks, i;
7488  
7489    this.remoteTextTracks().removeTrack_(track);
7490  
7491    tracks = this.el()['querySelectorAll']('track');
7492  
7493    for (i = 0; i < tracks.length; i++) {
7494      if (tracks[i] === track || tracks[i]['track'] === track) {
7495        tracks[i]['parentNode']['removeChild'](tracks[i]);
7496        break;
7497      }
7498    }
7499  };
7500  
7501  /* HTML5 Support Testing ---------------------------------------------------- */
7502  
7503  /**
7504   * Check if HTML5 video is supported by this browser/device
7505   * @return {Boolean}
7506   */
7507  vjs.Html5.isSupported = function(){
7508    // IE9 with no Media Player is a LIAR! (#984)
7509    try {
7510      vjs.TEST_VID['volume'] = 0.5;
7511    } catch (e) {
7512      return false;
7513    }
7514  
7515    return !!vjs.TEST_VID.canPlayType;
7516  };
7517  
7518  // Add Source Handler pattern functions to this tech
7519  vjs.MediaTechController.withSourceHandlers(vjs.Html5);
7520  
7521  /**
7522   * The default native source handler.
7523   * This simply passes the source to the video element. Nothing fancy.
7524   * @param  {Object} source   The source object
7525   * @param  {vjs.Html5} tech  The instance of the HTML5 tech
7526   */
7527  vjs.Html5.nativeSourceHandler = {};
7528  
7529  /**
7530   * Check if the video element can handle the source natively
7531   * @param  {Object} source  The source object
7532   * @return {String}         'probably', 'maybe', or '' (empty string)
7533   */
7534  vjs.Html5.nativeSourceHandler.canHandleSource = function(source){
7535    var match, ext;
7536  
7537    function canPlayType(type){
7538      // IE9 on Windows 7 without MediaPlayer throws an error here
7539      // https://github.com/videojs/video.js/issues/519
7540      try {
7541        return vjs.TEST_VID.canPlayType(type);
7542      } catch(e) {
7543        return '';
7544      }
7545    }
7546  
7547    // If a type was provided we should rely on that
7548    if (source.type) {
7549      return canPlayType(source.type);
7550    } else if (source.src) {
7551      // If no type, fall back to checking 'video/[EXTENSION]'
7552      match = source.src.match(/\.([^.\/\?]+)(\?[^\/]+)?$/i);
7553      ext = match && match[1];
7554  
7555      return canPlayType('video/'+ext);
7556    }
7557  
7558    return '';
7559  };
7560  
7561  /**
7562   * Pass the source to the video element
7563   * Adaptive source handlers will have more complicated workflows before passing
7564   * video data to the video element
7565   * @param  {Object} source    The source object
7566   * @param  {vjs.Html5} tech   The instance of the Html5 tech
7567   */
7568  vjs.Html5.nativeSourceHandler.handleSource = function(source, tech){
7569    tech.setSrc(source.src);
7570  };
7571  
7572  /**
7573   * Clean up the source handler when disposing the player or switching sources..
7574   * (no cleanup is needed when supporting the format natively)
7575   */
7576  vjs.Html5.nativeSourceHandler.dispose = function(){};
7577  
7578  // Register the native source handler
7579  vjs.Html5.registerSourceHandler(vjs.Html5.nativeSourceHandler);
7580  
7581  /**
7582   * Check if the volume can be changed in this browser/device.
7583   * Volume cannot be changed in a lot of mobile devices.
7584   * Specifically, it can't be changed from 1 on iOS.
7585   * @return {Boolean}
7586   */
7587  vjs.Html5.canControlVolume = function(){
7588    var volume =  vjs.TEST_VID.volume;
7589    vjs.TEST_VID.volume = (volume / 2) + 0.1;
7590    return volume !== vjs.TEST_VID.volume;
7591  };
7592  
7593  /**
7594   * Check if playbackRate is supported in this browser/device.
7595   * @return {[type]} [description]
7596   */
7597  vjs.Html5.canControlPlaybackRate = function(){
7598    var playbackRate =  vjs.TEST_VID.playbackRate;
7599    vjs.TEST_VID.playbackRate = (playbackRate / 2) + 0.1;
7600    return playbackRate !== vjs.TEST_VID.playbackRate;
7601  };
7602  
7603  /**
7604   * Check to see if native text tracks are supported by this browser/device
7605   * @return {Boolean}
7606   */
7607  vjs.Html5.supportsNativeTextTracks = function() {
7608    var supportsTextTracks;
7609  
7610    // Figure out native text track support
7611    // If mode is a number, we cannot change it because it'll disappear from view.
7612    // Browsers with numeric modes include IE10 and older (<=2013) samsung android models.
7613    // Firefox isn't playing nice either with modifying the mode
7614    // TODO: Investigate firefox: https://github.com/videojs/video.js/issues/1862
7615    supportsTextTracks = !!vjs.TEST_VID.textTracks;
7616    if (supportsTextTracks && vjs.TEST_VID.textTracks.length > 0) {
7617      supportsTextTracks = typeof vjs.TEST_VID.textTracks[0]['mode'] !== 'number';
7618    }
7619    if (supportsTextTracks && vjs.IS_FIREFOX) {
7620      supportsTextTracks = false;
7621    }
7622  
7623    return supportsTextTracks;
7624  };
7625  
7626  /**
7627   * Set the tech's volume control support status
7628   * @type {Boolean}
7629   */
7630  vjs.Html5.prototype['featuresVolumeControl'] = vjs.Html5.canControlVolume();
7631  
7632  /**
7633   * Set the tech's playbackRate support status
7634   * @type {Boolean}
7635   */
7636  vjs.Html5.prototype['featuresPlaybackRate'] = vjs.Html5.canControlPlaybackRate();
7637  
7638  /**
7639   * Set the tech's status on moving the video element.
7640   * In iOS, if you move a video element in the DOM, it breaks video playback.
7641   * @type {Boolean}
7642   */
7643  vjs.Html5.prototype['movingMediaElementInDOM'] = !vjs.IS_IOS;
7644  
7645  /**
7646   * Set the the tech's fullscreen resize support status.
7647   * HTML video is able to automatically resize when going to fullscreen.
7648   * (No longer appears to be used. Can probably be removed.)
7649   */
7650  vjs.Html5.prototype['featuresFullscreenResize'] = true;
7651  
7652  /**
7653   * Set the tech's progress event support status
7654   * (this disables the manual progress events of the MediaTechController)
7655   */
7656  vjs.Html5.prototype['featuresProgressEvents'] = true;
7657  
7658  /**
7659   * Sets the tech's status on native text track support
7660   * @type {Boolean}
7661   */
7662  vjs.Html5.prototype['featuresNativeTextTracks'] = vjs.Html5.supportsNativeTextTracks();
7663  
7664  // HTML5 Feature detection and Device Fixes --------------------------------- //
7665  (function() {
7666    var canPlayType,
7667        mpegurlRE = /^application\/(?:x-|vnd\.apple\.)mpegurl/i,
7668        mp4RE = /^video\/mp4/i;
7669  
7670    vjs.Html5.patchCanPlayType = function() {
7671      // Android 4.0 and above can play HLS to some extent but it reports being unable to do so
7672      if (vjs.ANDROID_VERSION >= 4.0) {
7673        if (!canPlayType) {
7674          canPlayType = vjs.TEST_VID.constructor.prototype.canPlayType;
7675        }
7676  
7677        vjs.TEST_VID.constructor.prototype.canPlayType = function(type) {
7678          if (type && mpegurlRE.test(type)) {
7679            return 'maybe';
7680          }
7681          return canPlayType.call(this, type);
7682        };
7683      }
7684  
7685      // Override Android 2.2 and less canPlayType method which is broken
7686      if (vjs.IS_OLD_ANDROID) {
7687        if (!canPlayType) {
7688          canPlayType = vjs.TEST_VID.constructor.prototype.canPlayType;
7689        }
7690  
7691        vjs.TEST_VID.constructor.prototype.canPlayType = function(type){
7692          if (type && mp4RE.test(type)) {
7693            return 'maybe';
7694          }
7695          return canPlayType.call(this, type);
7696        };
7697      }
7698    };
7699  
7700    vjs.Html5.unpatchCanPlayType = function() {
7701      var r = vjs.TEST_VID.constructor.prototype.canPlayType;
7702      vjs.TEST_VID.constructor.prototype.canPlayType = canPlayType;
7703      canPlayType = null;
7704      return r;
7705    };
7706  
7707    // by default, patch the video element
7708    vjs.Html5.patchCanPlayType();
7709  })();
7710  
7711  // List of all HTML5 events (various uses).
7712  vjs.Html5.Events = 'loadstart,suspend,abort,error,emptied,stalled,loadedmetadata,loadeddata,canplay,canplaythrough,playing,waiting,seeking,seeked,ended,durationchange,timeupdate,progress,play,pause,ratechange,volumechange'.split(',');
7713  
7714  vjs.Html5.disposeMediaElement = function(el){
7715    if (!el) { return; }
7716  
7717    el['player'] = null;
7718  
7719    if (el.parentNode) {
7720      el.parentNode.removeChild(el);
7721    }
7722  
7723    // remove any child track or source nodes to prevent their loading
7724    while(el.hasChildNodes()) {
7725      el.removeChild(el.firstChild);
7726    }
7727  
7728    // remove any src reference. not setting `src=''` because that causes a warning
7729    // in firefox
7730    el.removeAttribute('src');
7731  
7732    // force the media element to update its loading state by calling load()
7733    // however IE on Windows 7N has a bug that throws an error so need a try/catch (#793)
7734    if (typeof el.load === 'function') {
7735      // wrapping in an iife so it's not deoptimized (#1060#discussion_r10324473)
7736      (function() {
7737        try {
7738          el.load();
7739        } catch (e) {
7740          // not supported
7741        }
7742      })();
7743    }
7744  };
7745  /**
7746   * @fileoverview VideoJS-SWF - Custom Flash Player with HTML5-ish API
7747   * https://github.com/zencoder/video-js-swf
7748   * Not using setupTriggers. Using global onEvent func to distribute events
7749   */
7750  
7751  /**
7752   * Flash Media Controller - Wrapper for fallback SWF API
7753   *
7754   * @param {vjs.Player} player
7755   * @param {Object=} options
7756   * @param {Function=} ready
7757   * @constructor
7758   */
7759  vjs.Flash = vjs.MediaTechController.extend({
7760    /** @constructor */
7761    init: function(player, options, ready){
7762      vjs.MediaTechController.call(this, player, options, ready);
7763  
7764      var source = options['source'],
7765  
7766          // Which element to embed in
7767          parentEl = options['parentEl'],
7768  
7769          // Create a temporary element to be replaced by swf object
7770          placeHolder = this.el_ = vjs.createEl('div', { id: player.id() + '_temp_flash' }),
7771  
7772          // Generate ID for swf object
7773          objId = player.id()+'_flash_api',
7774  
7775          // Store player options in local var for optimization
7776          // TODO: switch to using player methods instead of options
7777          // e.g. player.autoplay();
7778          playerOptions = player.options_,
7779  
7780          // Merge default flashvars with ones passed in to init
7781          flashVars = vjs.obj.merge({
7782  
7783            // SWF Callback Functions
7784            'readyFunction': 'videojs.Flash.onReady',
7785            'eventProxyFunction': 'videojs.Flash.onEvent',
7786            'errorEventProxyFunction': 'videojs.Flash.onError',
7787  
7788            // Player Settings
7789            'autoplay': playerOptions.autoplay,
7790            'preload': playerOptions.preload,
7791            'loop': playerOptions.loop,
7792            'muted': playerOptions.muted
7793  
7794          }, options['flashVars']),
7795  
7796          // Merge default parames with ones passed in
7797          params = vjs.obj.merge({
7798            'wmode': 'opaque', // Opaque is needed to overlay controls, but can affect playback performance
7799            'bgcolor': '#000000' // Using bgcolor prevents a white flash when the object is loading
7800          }, options['params']),
7801  
7802          // Merge default attributes with ones passed in
7803          attributes = vjs.obj.merge({
7804            'id': objId,
7805            'name': objId, // Both ID and Name needed or swf to identify itself
7806            'class': 'vjs-tech'
7807          }, options['attributes'])
7808      ;
7809  
7810      // If source was supplied pass as a flash var.
7811      if (source) {
7812        this.ready(function(){
7813          this.setSource(source);
7814        });
7815      }
7816  
7817      // Add placeholder to player div
7818      vjs.insertFirst(placeHolder, parentEl);
7819  
7820      // Having issues with Flash reloading on certain page actions (hide/resize/fullscreen) in certain browsers
7821      // This allows resetting the playhead when we catch the reload
7822      if (options['startTime']) {
7823        this.ready(function(){
7824          this.load();
7825          this.play();
7826          this['currentTime'](options['startTime']);
7827        });
7828      }
7829  
7830      // firefox doesn't bubble mousemove events to parent. videojs/video-js-swf#37
7831      // bugzilla bug: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=836786
7832      if (vjs.IS_FIREFOX) {
7833        this.ready(function(){
7834          this.on('mousemove', function(){
7835            // since it's a custom event, don't bubble higher than the player
7836            this.player().trigger({ 'type':'mousemove', 'bubbles': false });
7837          });
7838        });
7839      }
7840  
7841      // native click events on the SWF aren't triggered on IE11, Win8.1RT
7842      // use stageclick events triggered from inside the SWF instead
7843      player.on('stageclick', player.reportUserActivity);
7844  
7845      this.el_ = vjs.Flash.embed(options['swf'], placeHolder, flashVars, params, attributes);
7846    }
7847  });
7848  
7849  vjs.Flash.prototype.dispose = function(){
7850    vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.dispose.call(this);
7851  };
7852  
7853  vjs.Flash.prototype.play = function(){
7854    this.el_.vjs_play();
7855  };
7856  
7857  vjs.Flash.prototype.pause = function(){
7858    this.el_.vjs_pause();
7859  };
7860  
7861  vjs.Flash.prototype.src = function(src){
7862    if (src === undefined) {
7863      return this['currentSrc']();
7864    }
7865  
7866    // Setting src through `src` not `setSrc` will be deprecated
7867    return this.setSrc(src);
7868  };
7869  
7870  vjs.Flash.prototype.setSrc = function(src){
7871    // Make sure source URL is absolute.
7872    src = vjs.getAbsoluteURL(src);
7873    this.el_.vjs_src(src);
7874  
7875    // Currently the SWF doesn't autoplay if you load a source later.
7876    // e.g. Load player w/ no source, wait 2s, set src.
7877    if (this.player_.autoplay()) {
7878      var tech = this;
7879      this.setTimeout(function(){ tech.play(); }, 0);
7880    }
7881  };
7882  
7883  vjs.Flash.prototype['setCurrentTime'] = function(time){
7884    this.lastSeekTarget_ = time;
7885    this.el_.vjs_setProperty('currentTime', time);
7886    vjs.MediaTechController.prototype.setCurrentTime.call(this);
7887  };
7888  
7889  vjs.Flash.prototype['currentTime'] = function(time){
7890    // when seeking make the reported time keep up with the requested time
7891    // by reading the time we're seeking to
7892    if (this.seeking()) {
7893      return this.lastSeekTarget_ || 0;
7894    }
7895    return this.el_.vjs_getProperty('currentTime');
7896  };
7897  
7898  vjs.Flash.prototype['currentSrc'] = function(){
7899    if (this.currentSource_) {
7900      return this.currentSource_.src;
7901    } else {
7902      return this.el_.vjs_getProperty('currentSrc');
7903    }
7904  };
7905  
7906  vjs.Flash.prototype.load = function(){
7907    this.el_.vjs_load();
7908  };
7909  
7910  vjs.Flash.prototype.poster = function(){
7911    this.el_.vjs_getProperty('poster');
7912  };
7913  vjs.Flash.prototype['setPoster'] = function(){
7914    // poster images are not handled by the Flash tech so make this a no-op
7915  };
7916  
7917  vjs.Flash.prototype.buffered = function(){
7918    return vjs.createTimeRange(0, this.el_.vjs_getProperty('buffered'));
7919  };
7920  
7921  vjs.Flash.prototype.supportsFullScreen = function(){
7922    return false; // Flash does not allow fullscreen through javascript
7923  };
7924  
7925  vjs.Flash.prototype.enterFullScreen = function(){
7926    return false;
7927  };
7928  
7929  (function(){
7930    // Create setters and getters for attributes
7931    var api = vjs.Flash.prototype,
7932      readWrite = 'rtmpConnection,rtmpStream,preload,defaultPlaybackRate,playbackRate,autoplay,loop,mediaGroup,controller,controls,volume,muted,defaultMuted'.split(','),
7933      readOnly = 'error,networkState,readyState,seeking,initialTime,duration,startOffsetTime,paused,played,seekable,ended,videoTracks,audioTracks,videoWidth,videoHeight'.split(','),
7934      // Overridden: buffered, currentTime, currentSrc
7935      i;
7936  
7937    function createSetter(attr){
7938      var attrUpper = attr.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + attr.slice(1);
7939      api['set'+attrUpper] = function(val){ return this.el_.vjs_setProperty(attr, val); };
7940    }
7941    function createGetter(attr) {
7942      api[attr] = function(){ return this.el_.vjs_getProperty(attr); };
7943    }
7944  
7945    // Create getter and setters for all read/write attributes
7946    for (i = 0; i < readWrite.length; i++) {
7947      createGetter(readWrite[i]);
7948      createSetter(readWrite[i]);
7949    }
7950  
7951    // Create getters for read-only attributes
7952    for (i = 0; i < readOnly.length; i++) {
7953      createGetter(readOnly[i]);
7954    }
7955  })();
7956  
7957  /* Flash Support Testing -------------------------------------------------------- */
7958  
7959  vjs.Flash.isSupported = function(){
7960    return vjs.Flash.version()[0] >= 10;
7961    // return swfobject.hasFlashPlayerVersion('10');
7962  };
7963  
7964  // Add Source Handler pattern functions to this tech
7965  vjs.MediaTechController.withSourceHandlers(vjs.Flash);
7966  
7967  /**
7968   * The default native source handler.
7969   * This simply passes the source to the video element. Nothing fancy.
7970   * @param  {Object} source   The source object
7971   * @param  {vjs.Flash} tech  The instance of the Flash tech
7972   */
7973  vjs.Flash.nativeSourceHandler = {};
7974  
7975  /**
7976   * Check Flash can handle the source natively
7977   * @param  {Object} source  The source object
7978   * @return {String}         'probably', 'maybe', or '' (empty string)
7979   */
7980  vjs.Flash.nativeSourceHandler.canHandleSource = function(source){
7981    var type;
7982  
7983    if (!source.type) {
7984      return '';
7985    }
7986  
7987    // Strip code information from the type because we don't get that specific
7988    type = source.type.replace(/;.*/,'').toLowerCase();
7989  
7990    if (type in vjs.Flash.formats) {
7991      return 'maybe';
7992    }
7993  
7994    return '';
7995  };
7996  
7997  /**
7998   * Pass the source to the flash object
7999   * Adaptive source handlers will have more complicated workflows before passing
8000   * video data to the video element
8001   * @param  {Object} source    The source object
8002   * @param  {vjs.Flash} tech   The instance of the Flash tech
8003   */
8004  vjs.Flash.nativeSourceHandler.handleSource = function(source, tech){
8005    tech.setSrc(source.src);
8006  };
8007  
8008  /**
8009   * Clean up the source handler when disposing the player or switching sources..
8010   * (no cleanup is needed when supporting the format natively)
8011   */
8012  vjs.Flash.nativeSourceHandler.dispose = function(){};
8013  
8014  // Register the native source handler
8015  vjs.Flash.registerSourceHandler(vjs.Flash.nativeSourceHandler);
8016  
8017  vjs.Flash.formats = {
8018    'video/flv': 'FLV',
8019    'video/x-flv': 'FLV',
8020    'video/mp4': 'MP4',
8021    'video/m4v': 'MP4'
8022  };
8023  
8024  vjs.Flash['onReady'] = function(currSwf){
8025    var el, player;
8026  
8027    el = vjs.el(currSwf);
8028  
8029    // get player from the player div property
8030    player = el && el.parentNode && el.parentNode['player'];
8031  
8032    // if there is no el or player then the tech has been disposed
8033    // and the tech element was removed from the player div
8034    if (player) {
8035      // reference player on tech element
8036      el['player'] = player;
8037      // check that the flash object is really ready
8038      vjs.Flash['checkReady'](player.tech);
8039    }
8040  };
8041  
8042  // The SWF isn't always ready when it says it is. Sometimes the API functions still need to be added to the object.
8043  // If it's not ready, we set a timeout to check again shortly.
8044  vjs.Flash['checkReady'] = function(tech){
8045    // stop worrying if the tech has been disposed
8046    if (!tech.el()) {
8047      return;
8048    }
8049  
8050    // check if API property exists
8051    if (tech.el().vjs_getProperty) {
8052      // tell tech it's ready
8053      tech.triggerReady();
8054    } else {
8055      // wait longer
8056      this.setTimeout(function(){
8057        vjs.Flash['checkReady'](tech);
8058      }, 50);
8059    }
8060  };
8061  
8062  // Trigger events from the swf on the player
8063  vjs.Flash['onEvent'] = function(swfID, eventName){
8064    var player = vjs.el(swfID)['player'];
8065    player.trigger(eventName);
8066  };
8067  
8068  // Log errors from the swf
8069  vjs.Flash['onError'] = function(swfID, err){
8070    var player = vjs.el(swfID)['player'];
8071    var msg = 'FLASH: '+err;
8072  
8073    if (err == 'srcnotfound') {
8074      player.error({ code: 4, message: msg });
8075  
8076    // errors we haven't categorized into the media errors
8077    } else {
8078      player.error(msg);
8079    }
8080  };
8081  
8082  // Flash Version Check
8083  vjs.Flash.version = function(){
8084    var version = '0,0,0';
8085  
8086    // IE
8087    try {
8088      version = new window.ActiveXObject('ShockwaveFlash.ShockwaveFlash').GetVariable('$version').replace(/\D+/g, ',').match(/^,?(.+),?$/)[1];
8089  
8090    // other browsers
8091    } catch(e) {
8092      try {
8093        if (navigator.mimeTypes['application/x-shockwave-flash'].enabledPlugin){
8094          version = (navigator.plugins['Shockwave Flash 2.0'] || navigator.plugins['Shockwave Flash']).description.replace(/\D+/g, ',').match(/^,?(.+),?$/)[1];
8095        }
8096      } catch(err) {}
8097    }
8098    return version.split(',');
8099  };
8100  
8101  // Flash embedding method. Only used in non-iframe mode
8102  vjs.Flash.embed = function(swf, placeHolder, flashVars, params, attributes){
8103    var code = vjs.Flash.getEmbedCode(swf, flashVars, params, attributes),
8104  
8105        // Get element by embedding code and retrieving created element
8106        obj = vjs.createEl('div', { innerHTML: code }).childNodes[0],
8107  
8108        par = placeHolder.parentNode
8109    ;
8110  
8111    placeHolder.parentNode.replaceChild(obj, placeHolder);
8112  
8113    // IE6 seems to have an issue where it won't initialize the swf object after injecting it.
8114    // This is a dumb fix
8115    var newObj = par.childNodes[0];
8116    setTimeout(function(){
8117      newObj.style.display = 'block';
8118    }, 1000);
8119  
8120    return obj;
8121  
8122  };
8123  
8124  vjs.Flash.getEmbedCode = function(swf, flashVars, params, attributes){
8125  
8126    var objTag = '<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" ',
8127        flashVarsString = '',
8128        paramsString = '',
8129        attrsString = '';
8130  
8131    // Convert flash vars to string
8132    if (flashVars) {
8133      vjs.obj.each(flashVars, function(key, val){
8134        flashVarsString += (key + '=' + val + '&amp;');
8135      });
8136    }
8137  
8138    // Add swf, flashVars, and other default params
8139    params = vjs.obj.merge({
8140      'movie': swf,
8141      'flashvars': flashVarsString,
8142      'allowScriptAccess': 'always', // Required to talk to swf
8143      'allowNetworking': 'all' // All should be default, but having security issues.
8144    }, params);
8145  
8146    // Create param tags string
8147    vjs.obj.each(params, function(key, val){
8148      paramsString += '<param name="'+key+'" value="'+val+'" />';
8149    });
8150  
8151    attributes = vjs.obj.merge({
8152      // Add swf to attributes (need both for IE and Others to work)
8153      'data': swf,
8154  
8155      // Default to 100% width/height
8156      'width': '100%',
8157      'height': '100%'
8158  
8159    }, attributes);
8160  
8161    // Create Attributes string
8162    vjs.obj.each(attributes, function(key, val){
8163      attrsString += (key + '="' + val + '" ');
8164    });
8165  
8166    return objTag + attrsString + '>' + paramsString + '</object>';
8167  };
8168  vjs.Flash.streamingFormats = {
8169    'rtmp/mp4': 'MP4',
8170    'rtmp/flv': 'FLV'
8171  };
8172  
8173  vjs.Flash.streamFromParts = function(connection, stream) {
8174    return connection + '&' + stream;
8175  };
8176  
8177  vjs.Flash.streamToParts = function(src) {
8178    var parts = {
8179      connection: '',
8180      stream: ''
8181    };
8182  
8183    if (! src) {
8184      return parts;
8185    }
8186  
8187    // Look for the normal URL separator we expect, '&'.
8188    // If found, we split the URL into two pieces around the
8189    // first '&'.
8190    var connEnd = src.indexOf('&');
8191    var streamBegin;
8192    if (connEnd !== -1) {
8193      streamBegin = connEnd + 1;
8194    }
8195    else {
8196      // If there's not a '&', we use the last '/' as the delimiter.
8197      connEnd = streamBegin = src.lastIndexOf('/') + 1;
8198      if (connEnd === 0) {
8199        // really, there's not a '/'?
8200        connEnd = streamBegin = src.length;
8201      }
8202    }
8203    parts.connection = src.substring(0, connEnd);
8204    parts.stream = src.substring(streamBegin, src.length);
8205  
8206    return parts;
8207  };
8208  
8209  vjs.Flash.isStreamingType = function(srcType) {
8210    return srcType in vjs.Flash.streamingFormats;
8211  };
8212  
8213  // RTMP has four variations, any string starting
8214  // with one of these protocols should be valid
8215  vjs.Flash.RTMP_RE = /^rtmp[set]?:\/\//i;
8216  
8217  vjs.Flash.isStreamingSrc = function(src) {
8218    return vjs.Flash.RTMP_RE.test(src);
8219  };
8220  
8221  /**
8222   * A source handler for RTMP urls
8223   * @type {Object}
8224   */
8225  vjs.Flash.rtmpSourceHandler = {};
8226  
8227  /**
8228   * Check Flash can handle the source natively
8229   * @param  {Object} source  The source object
8230   * @return {String}         'probably', 'maybe', or '' (empty string)
8231   */
8232  vjs.Flash.rtmpSourceHandler.canHandleSource = function(source){
8233    if (vjs.Flash.isStreamingType(source.type) || vjs.Flash.isStreamingSrc(source.src)) {
8234      return 'maybe';
8235    }
8236  
8237    return '';
8238  };
8239  
8240  /**
8241   * Pass the source to the flash object
8242   * Adaptive source handlers will have more complicated workflows before passing
8243   * video data to the video element
8244   * @param  {Object} source    The source object
8245   * @param  {vjs.Flash} tech   The instance of the Flash tech
8246   */
8247  vjs.Flash.rtmpSourceHandler.handleSource = function(source, tech){
8248    var srcParts = vjs.Flash.streamToParts(source.src);
8249  
8250    tech['setRtmpConnection'](srcParts.connection);
8251    tech['setRtmpStream'](srcParts.stream);
8252  };
8253  
8254  // Register the native source handler
8255  vjs.Flash.registerSourceHandler(vjs.Flash.rtmpSourceHandler);
8256  /**
8257   * The Media Loader is the component that decides which playback technology to load
8258   * when the player is initialized.
8259   *
8260   * @constructor
8261   */
8262  vjs.MediaLoader = vjs.Component.extend({
8263    /** @constructor */
8264    init: function(player, options, ready){
8265      vjs.Component.call(this, player, options, ready);
8266  
8267      // If there are no sources when the player is initialized,
8268      // load the first supported playback technology.
8269      if (!player.options_['sources'] || player.options_['sources'].length === 0) {
8270        for (var i=0,j=player.options_['techOrder']; i<j.length; i++) {
8271          var techName = vjs.capitalize(j[i]),
8272              tech = window['videojs'][techName];
8273  
8274          // Check if the browser supports this technology
8275          if (tech && tech.isSupported()) {
8276            player.loadTech(techName);
8277            break;
8278          }
8279        }
8280      } else {
8281        // // Loop through playback technologies (HTML5, Flash) and check for support.
8282        // // Then load the best source.
8283        // // A few assumptions here:
8284        // //   All playback technologies respect preload false.
8285        player.src(player.options_['sources']);
8286      }
8287    }
8288  });
8289  /*
8290   * https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/embedded-content.html#texttrackmode
8291   *
8292   * enum TextTrackMode { "disabled",  "hidden",  "showing" };
8293   */
8294  vjs.TextTrackMode = {
8295    'disabled': 'disabled',
8296    'hidden': 'hidden',
8297    'showing': 'showing'
8298  };
8299  
8300  /*
8301   * https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/embedded-content.html#texttrackkind
8302   *
8303   * enum TextTrackKind { "subtitles",  "captions",  "descriptions",  "chapters",  "metadata" };
8304   */
8305  vjs.TextTrackKind = {
8306    'subtitles': 'subtitles',
8307    'captions': 'captions',
8308    'descriptions': 'descriptions',
8309    'chapters': 'chapters',
8310    'metadata': 'metadata'
8311  };
8312  (function() {
8313  /*
8314   * https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/embedded-content.html#texttrack
8315   *
8316   * interface TextTrack : EventTarget {
8317   *   readonly attribute TextTrackKind kind;
8318   *   readonly attribute DOMString label;
8319   *   readonly attribute DOMString language;
8320   *
8321   *   readonly attribute DOMString id;
8322   *   readonly attribute DOMString inBandMetadataTrackDispatchType;
8323   *
8324   *   attribute TextTrackMode mode;
8325   *
8326   *   readonly attribute TextTrackCueList? cues;
8327   *   readonly attribute TextTrackCueList? activeCues;
8328   *
8329   *   void addCue(TextTrackCue cue);
8330   *   void removeCue(TextTrackCue cue);
8331   *
8332   *   attribute EventHandler oncuechange;
8333   * };
8334   */
8335  
8336  vjs.TextTrack = function(options) {
8337    var tt, id, mode, kind, label, language, cues, activeCues, timeupdateHandler, changed, prop;
8338  
8339    options = options || {};
8340  
8341    if (!options['player']) {
8342      throw new Error('A player was not provided.');
8343    }
8344  
8345    tt = this;
8346    if (vjs.IS_IE8) {
8347      tt = document.createElement('custom');
8348  
8349      for (prop in vjs.TextTrack.prototype) {
8350        tt[prop] = vjs.TextTrack.prototype[prop];
8351      }
8352    }
8353  
8354    tt.player_ = options['player'];
8355  
8356    mode = vjs.TextTrackMode[options['mode']] || 'disabled';
8357    kind = vjs.TextTrackKind[options['kind']] || 'subtitles';
8358    label = options['label'] || '';
8359    language = options['language'] || options['srclang'] || '';
8360    id = options['id'] || 'vjs_text_track_' + vjs.guid++;
8361  
8362    if (kind === 'metadata' || kind === 'chapters') {
8363      mode = 'hidden';
8364    }
8365  
8366    tt.cues_ = [];
8367    tt.activeCues_ = [];
8368  
8369    cues = new vjs.TextTrackCueList(tt.cues_);
8370    activeCues = new vjs.TextTrackCueList(tt.activeCues_);
8371  
8372    changed = false;
8373    timeupdateHandler = vjs.bind(tt, function() {
8374      this['activeCues'];
8375      if (changed) {
8376        this['trigger']('cuechange');
8377        changed = false;
8378      }
8379    });
8380    if (mode !== 'disabled') {
8381      tt.player_.on('timeupdate', timeupdateHandler);
8382    }
8383  
8384    Object.defineProperty(tt, 'kind', {
8385      get: function() {
8386        return kind;
8387      },
8388      set: Function.prototype
8389    });
8390  
8391    Object.defineProperty(tt, 'label', {
8392      get: function() {
8393        return label;
8394      },
8395      set: Function.prototype
8396    });
8397  
8398    Object.defineProperty(tt, 'language', {
8399      get: function() {
8400        return language;
8401      },
8402      set: Function.prototype
8403    });
8404  
8405    Object.defineProperty(tt, 'id', {
8406      get: function() {
8407        return id;
8408      },
8409      set: Function.prototype
8410    });
8411  
8412    Object.defineProperty(tt, 'mode', {
8413      get: function() {
8414        return mode;
8415      },
8416      set: function(newMode) {
8417        if (!vjs.TextTrackMode[newMode]) {
8418          return;
8419        }
8420        mode = newMode;
8421        if (mode === 'showing') {
8422          this.player_.on('timeupdate', timeupdateHandler);
8423        }
8424        this.trigger('modechange');
8425      }
8426    });
8427  
8428    Object.defineProperty(tt, 'cues', {
8429      get: function() {
8430        if (!this.loaded_) {
8431          return null;
8432        }
8433  
8434        return cues;
8435      },
8436      set: Function.prototype
8437    });
8438  
8439    Object.defineProperty(tt, 'activeCues', {
8440      get: function() {
8441        var i, l, active, ct, cue;
8442  
8443        if (!this.loaded_) {
8444          return null;
8445        }
8446  
8447        if (this['cues'].length === 0) {
8448          return activeCues; // nothing to do
8449        }
8450  
8451        ct = this.player_.currentTime();
8452        i = 0;
8453        l = this['cues'].length;
8454        active = [];
8455  
8456        for (; i < l; i++) {
8457          cue = this['cues'][i];
8458          if (cue['startTime'] <= ct && cue['endTime'] >= ct) {
8459            active.push(cue);
8460          } else if (cue['startTime'] === cue['endTime'] && cue['startTime'] <= ct && cue['startTime'] + 0.5 >= ct) {
8461            active.push(cue);
8462          }
8463        }
8464  
8465        changed = false;
8466  
8467        if (active.length !== this.activeCues_.length) {
8468          changed = true;
8469        } else {
8470          for (i = 0; i < active.length; i++) {
8471            if (indexOf.call(this.activeCues_, active[i]) === -1) {
8472              changed = true;
8473            }
8474          }
8475        }
8476  
8477        this.activeCues_ = active;
8478        activeCues.setCues_(this.activeCues_);
8479  
8480        return activeCues;
8481      },
8482      set: Function.prototype
8483    });
8484  
8485    if (options.src) {
8486      loadTrack(options.src, tt);
8487    } else {
8488      tt.loaded_ = true;
8489    }
8490  
8491    if (vjs.IS_IE8) {
8492      return tt;
8493    }
8494  };
8495  
8496  vjs.TextTrack.prototype = vjs.obj.create(vjs.EventEmitter.prototype);
8497  vjs.TextTrack.prototype.constructor = vjs.TextTrack;
8498  
8499  /*
8500   * cuechange - One or more cues in the track have become active or stopped being active.
8501   */
8502  vjs.TextTrack.prototype.allowedEvents_ = {
8503    'cuechange': 'cuechange'
8504  };
8505  
8506  vjs.TextTrack.prototype.addCue = function(cue) {
8507    var tracks = this.player_.textTracks(),
8508        i = 0;
8509  
8510    if (tracks) {
8511      for (; i < tracks.length; i++) {
8512        if (tracks[i] !== this) {
8513          tracks[i].removeCue(cue);
8514        }
8515      }
8516    }
8517  
8518    this.cues_.push(cue);
8519    this['cues'].setCues_(this.cues_);
8520  };
8521  
8522  vjs.TextTrack.prototype.removeCue = function(removeCue) {
8523    var i = 0,
8524        l = this.cues_.length,
8525        cue,
8526        removed = false;
8527  
8528    for (; i < l; i++) {
8529      cue = this.cues_[i];
8530      if (cue === removeCue) {
8531        this.cues_.splice(i, 1);
8532        removed = true;
8533      }
8534    }
8535  
8536    if (removed) {
8537      this.cues.setCues_(this.cues_);
8538    }
8539  };
8540  
8541  /*
8542   * Downloading stuff happens below this point
8543   */
8544  var loadTrack, parseCues, indexOf;
8545  
8546  loadTrack = function(src, track) {
8547    vjs.xhr(src, vjs.bind(this, function(err, response, responseBody){
8548      if (err) {
8549        return vjs.log.error(err);
8550      }
8551  
8552  
8553      track.loaded_ = true;
8554      parseCues(responseBody, track);
8555    }));
8556  };
8557  
8558  parseCues = function(srcContent, track) {
8559    if (typeof window['WebVTT'] !== 'function') {
8560      //try again a bit later
8561      return window.setTimeout(function() {
8562        parseCues(srcContent, track);
8563      }, 25);
8564    }
8565  
8566    var parser = new window['WebVTT']['Parser'](window, window['vttjs'], window['WebVTT']['StringDecoder']());
8567  
8568    parser['oncue'] = function(cue) {
8569      track.addCue(cue);
8570    };
8571    parser['onparsingerror'] = function(error) {
8572      vjs.log.error(error);
8573    };
8574  
8575    parser['parse'](srcContent);
8576    parser['flush']();
8577  };
8578  
8579  indexOf = function(searchElement, fromIndex) {
8580  
8581    var k;
8582  
8583    if (this == null) {
8584      throw new TypeError('"this" is null or not defined');
8585    }
8586  
8587    var O = Object(this);
8588  
8589    var len = O.length >>> 0;
8590  
8591    if (len === 0) {
8592      return -1;
8593    }
8594  
8595    var n = +fromIndex || 0;
8596  
8597    if (Math.abs(n) === Infinity) {
8598      n = 0;
8599    }
8600  
8601    if (n >= len) {
8602      return -1;
8603    }
8604  
8605    k = Math.max(n >= 0 ? n : len - Math.abs(n), 0);
8606  
8607    while (k < len) {
8608      if (k in O && O[k] === searchElement) {
8609        return k;
8610      }
8611      k++;
8612    }
8613    return -1;
8614  };
8615  
8616  })();
8617  /*
8618   * https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/embedded-content.html#texttracklist
8619   *
8620   * interface TextTrackList : EventTarget {
8621   *   readonly attribute unsigned long length;
8622   *   getter TextTrack (unsigned long index);
8623   *   TextTrack? getTrackById(DOMString id);
8624   * 
8625   *   attribute EventHandler onchange;
8626   *   attribute EventHandler onaddtrack;
8627   *   attribute EventHandler onremovetrack;
8628   * };
8629   */
8630  vjs.TextTrackList = function(tracks) {
8631    var list = this,
8632        prop,
8633        i = 0;
8634  
8635    if (vjs.IS_IE8) {
8636      list = document.createElement('custom');
8637  
8638      for (prop in vjs.TextTrackList.prototype) {
8639        list[prop] = vjs.TextTrackList.prototype[prop];
8640      }
8641    }
8642  
8643    tracks = tracks || [];
8644    list.tracks_ = [];
8645  
8646    Object.defineProperty(list, 'length', {
8647      get: function() {
8648        return this.tracks_.length;
8649      }
8650    });
8651  
8652    for (; i < tracks.length; i++) {
8653      list.addTrack_(tracks[i]);
8654    }
8655  
8656    if (vjs.IS_IE8) {
8657      return list;
8658    }
8659  };
8660  
8661  vjs.TextTrackList.prototype = vjs.obj.create(vjs.EventEmitter.prototype);
8662  vjs.TextTrackList.prototype.constructor = vjs.TextTrackList;
8663  
8664  /*
8665   * change - One or more tracks in the track list have been enabled or disabled.
8666   * addtrack - A track has been added to the track list.
8667   * removetrack - A track has been removed from the track list.
8668  */
8669  vjs.TextTrackList.prototype.allowedEvents_ = {
8670    'change': 'change',
8671    'addtrack': 'addtrack',
8672    'removetrack': 'removetrack'
8673  };
8674  
8675  // emulate attribute EventHandler support to allow for feature detection
8676  (function() {
8677    var event;
8678  
8679    for (event in vjs.TextTrackList.prototype.allowedEvents_) {
8680      vjs.TextTrackList.prototype['on' + event] = null;
8681    }
8682  })();
8683  
8684  vjs.TextTrackList.prototype.addTrack_ = function(track) {
8685    var index = this.tracks_.length;
8686    if (!(''+index in this)) {
8687      Object.defineProperty(this, index, {
8688        get: function() {
8689          return this.tracks_[index];
8690        }
8691      });
8692    }
8693  
8694    track.addEventListener('modechange', vjs.bind(this, function() {
8695      this.trigger('change');
8696    }));
8697    this.tracks_.push(track);
8698  
8699    this.trigger({
8700      type: 'addtrack',
8701      track: track
8702    });
8703  };
8704  
8705  vjs.TextTrackList.prototype.removeTrack_ = function(rtrack) {
8706    var i = 0,
8707        l = this.length,
8708        result = null,
8709        track;
8710  
8711    for (; i < l; i++) {
8712      track = this[i];
8713      if (track === rtrack) {
8714        this.tracks_.splice(i, 1);
8715        break;
8716      }
8717    }
8718  
8719    this.trigger({
8720      type: 'removetrack',
8721      track: rtrack
8722    });
8723  };
8724  
8725  vjs.TextTrackList.prototype.getTrackById = function(id) {
8726    var i = 0,
8727        l = this.length,
8728        result = null,
8729        track;
8730  
8731    for (; i < l; i++) {
8732      track = this[i];
8733      if (track.id === id) {
8734        result = track;
8735        break;
8736      }
8737    }
8738  
8739    return result;
8740  };
8741  /*
8742   * https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/embedded-content.html#texttrackcuelist
8743   *
8744   * interface TextTrackCueList {
8745   *   readonly attribute unsigned long length;
8746   *   getter TextTrackCue (unsigned long index);
8747   *   TextTrackCue? getCueById(DOMString id);
8748   * };
8749   */
8750  
8751  vjs.TextTrackCueList = function(cues) {
8752    var list = this,
8753        prop;
8754  
8755    if (vjs.IS_IE8) {
8756      list = document.createElement('custom');
8757  
8758      for (prop in vjs.TextTrackCueList.prototype) {
8759        list[prop] = vjs.TextTrackCueList.prototype[prop];
8760      }
8761    }
8762  
8763    vjs.TextTrackCueList.prototype.setCues_.call(list, cues);
8764  
8765    Object.defineProperty(list, 'length', {
8766      get: function() {
8767        return this.length_;
8768      }
8769    });
8770  
8771    if (vjs.IS_IE8) {
8772      return list;
8773    }
8774  };
8775  
8776  vjs.TextTrackCueList.prototype.setCues_ = function(cues) {
8777    var oldLength = this.length || 0,
8778        i = 0,
8779        l = cues.length,
8780        defineProp;
8781  
8782    this.cues_ = cues;
8783    this.length_ = cues.length;
8784  
8785    defineProp = function(i) {
8786      if (!(''+i in this)) {
8787        Object.defineProperty(this, '' + i, {
8788          get: function() {
8789            return this.cues_[i];
8790          }
8791        });
8792      }
8793    };
8794  
8795    if (oldLength < l) {
8796      i = oldLength;
8797      for(; i < l; i++) {
8798        defineProp.call(this, i);
8799      }
8800    }
8801  };
8802  
8803  vjs.TextTrackCueList.prototype.getCueById = function(id) {
8804    var i = 0,
8805        l = this.length,
8806        result = null,
8807        cue;
8808  
8809    for (; i < l; i++) {
8810      cue = this[i];
8811      if (cue.id === id) {
8812        result = cue;
8813        break;
8814      }
8815    }
8816  
8817    return result;
8818  };
8819  (function() {
8820  'use strict';
8821  
8822  /* Text Track Display
8823  ============================================================================= */
8824  // Global container for both subtitle and captions text. Simple div container.
8825  
8826  /**
8827   * The component for displaying text track cues
8828   *
8829   * @constructor
8830   */
8831  vjs.TextTrackDisplay = vjs.Component.extend({
8832    /** @constructor */
8833    init: function(player, options, ready){
8834      vjs.Component.call(this, player, options, ready);
8835  
8836      player.on('loadstart', vjs.bind(this, this.toggleDisplay));
8837  
8838      // This used to be called during player init, but was causing an error
8839      // if a track should show by default and the display hadn't loaded yet.
8840      // Should probably be moved to an external track loader when we support
8841      // tracks that don't need a display.
8842      player.ready(vjs.bind(this, function() {
8843        if (player.tech && player.tech['featuresNativeTextTracks']) {
8844          this.hide();
8845          return;
8846        }
8847  
8848        var i, tracks, track;
8849  
8850        player.on('fullscreenchange', vjs.bind(this, this.updateDisplay));
8851  
8852        tracks = player.options_['tracks'] || [];
8853        for (i = 0; i < tracks.length; i++) {
8854          track = tracks[i];
8855          this.player_.addRemoteTextTrack(track);
8856        }
8857      }));
8858    }
8859  });
8860  
8861  vjs.TextTrackDisplay.prototype.toggleDisplay = function() {
8862    if (this.player_.tech && this.player_.tech['featuresNativeTextTracks']) {
8863      this.hide();
8864    } else {
8865      this.show();
8866    }
8867  };
8868  
8869  vjs.TextTrackDisplay.prototype.createEl = function(){
8870    return vjs.Component.prototype.createEl.call(this, 'div', {
8871      className: 'vjs-text-track-display'
8872    });
8873  };
8874  
8875  vjs.TextTrackDisplay.prototype.clearDisplay = function() {
8876    if (typeof window['WebVTT'] === 'function') {
8877      window['WebVTT']['processCues'](window, [], this.el_);
8878    }
8879  };
8880  
8881  // Add cue HTML to display
8882  var constructColor = function(color, opacity) {
8883    return 'rgba(' +
8884      // color looks like "#f0e"
8885      parseInt(color[1] + color[1], 16) + ',' +
8886      parseInt(color[2] + color[2], 16) + ',' +
8887      parseInt(color[3] + color[3], 16) + ',' +
8888      opacity + ')';
8889  };
8890  var darkGray = '#222';
8891  var lightGray = '#ccc';
8892  var fontMap = {
8893    monospace:             'monospace',
8894    sansSerif:             'sans-serif',
8895    serif:                 'serif',
8896    monospaceSansSerif:    '"Andale Mono", "Lucida Console", monospace',
8897    monospaceSerif:        '"Courier New", monospace',
8898    proportionalSansSerif: 'sans-serif',
8899    proportionalSerif:     'serif',
8900    casual:                '"Comic Sans MS", Impact, fantasy',
8901    script:                '"Monotype Corsiva", cursive',
8902    smallcaps:             '"Andale Mono", "Lucida Console", monospace, sans-serif'
8903  };
8904  var tryUpdateStyle = function(el, style, rule) {
8905    // some style changes will throw an error, particularly in IE8. Those should be noops.
8906    try {
8907      el.style[style] = rule;
8908    } catch (e) {}
8909  };
8910  
8911  vjs.TextTrackDisplay.prototype.updateDisplay = function() {
8912    var tracks = this.player_.textTracks(),
8913        i = 0,
8914        track;
8915  
8916    this.clearDisplay();
8917  
8918    if (!tracks) {
8919      return;
8920    }
8921  
8922    for (; i < tracks.length; i++) {
8923      track = tracks[i];
8924      if (track['mode'] === 'showing') {
8925        this.updateForTrack(track);
8926      }
8927    }
8928  };
8929  
8930  vjs.TextTrackDisplay.prototype.updateForTrack = function(track) {
8931    if (typeof window['WebVTT'] !== 'function' || !track['activeCues']) {
8932      return;
8933    }
8934  
8935    var i = 0,
8936        property,
8937        cueDiv,
8938        overrides = this.player_['textTrackSettings'].getValues(),
8939        fontSize,
8940        cues = [];
8941  
8942    for (; i < track['activeCues'].length; i++) {
8943      cues.push(track['activeCues'][i]);
8944    }
8945  
8946    window['WebVTT']['processCues'](window, track['activeCues'], this.el_);
8947  
8948    i = cues.length;
8949    while (i--) {
8950      cueDiv = cues[i].displayState;
8951      if (overrides.color) {
8952        cueDiv.firstChild.style.color = overrides.color;
8953      }
8954      if (overrides.textOpacity) {
8955        tryUpdateStyle(cueDiv.firstChild,
8956                       'color',
8957                       constructColor(overrides.color || '#fff',
8958                                      overrides.textOpacity));
8959      }
8960      if (overrides.backgroundColor) {
8961        cueDiv.firstChild.style.backgroundColor = overrides.backgroundColor;
8962      }
8963      if (overrides.backgroundOpacity) {
8964        tryUpdateStyle(cueDiv.firstChild,
8965                       'backgroundColor',
8966                       constructColor(overrides.backgroundColor || '#000',
8967                                      overrides.backgroundOpacity));
8968      }
8969      if (overrides.windowColor) {
8970        if (overrides.windowOpacity) {
8971          tryUpdateStyle(cueDiv,
8972                         'backgroundColor',
8973                         constructColor(overrides.windowColor, overrides.windowOpacity));
8974        } else {
8975          cueDiv.style.backgroundColor = overrides.windowColor;
8976        }
8977      }
8978      if (overrides.edgeStyle) {
8979        if (overrides.edgeStyle === 'dropshadow') {
8980          cueDiv.firstChild.style.textShadow = '2px 2px 3px ' + darkGray + ', 2px 2px 4px ' + darkGray + ', 2px 2px 5px ' + darkGray;
8981        } else if (overrides.edgeStyle === 'raised') {
8982          cueDiv.firstChild.style.textShadow = '1px 1px ' + darkGray + ', 2px 2px ' + darkGray + ', 3px 3px ' + darkGray;
8983        } else if (overrides.edgeStyle === 'depressed') {
8984          cueDiv.firstChild.style.textShadow = '1px 1px ' + lightGray + ', 0 1px ' + lightGray + ', -1px -1px ' + darkGray + ', 0 -1px ' + darkGray;
8985        } else if (overrides.edgeStyle === 'uniform') {
8986          cueDiv.firstChild.style.textShadow = '0 0 4px ' + darkGray + ', 0 0 4px ' + darkGray + ', 0 0 4px ' + darkGray + ', 0 0 4px ' + darkGray;
8987        }
8988      }
8989      if (overrides.fontPercent && overrides.fontPercent !== 1) {
8990        fontSize = window.parseFloat(cueDiv.style.fontSize);
8991        cueDiv.style.fontSize = (fontSize * overrides.fontPercent) + 'px';
8992        cueDiv.style.height = 'auto';
8993        cueDiv.style.top = 'auto';
8994        cueDiv.style.bottom = '2px';
8995      }
8996      if (overrides.fontFamily && overrides.fontFamily !== 'default') {
8997        if (overrides.fontFamily === 'small-caps') {
8998          cueDiv.firstChild.style.fontVariant = 'small-caps';
8999        } else {
9000          cueDiv.firstChild.style.fontFamily = fontMap[overrides.fontFamily];
9001        }
9002      }
9003    }
9004  };
9005  
9006  
9007  /**
9008   * The specific menu post type for selecting a language within a text track kind
9009   *
9010   * @constructor
9011   */
9012  vjs.TextTrackMenuItem = vjs.MenuItem.extend({
9013    /** @constructor */
9014    init: function(player, options){
9015      var track = this.track = options['track'],
9016          tracks = player.textTracks(),
9017          changeHandler,
9018          event;
9019  
9020      if (tracks) {
9021        changeHandler = vjs.bind(this, function() {
9022          var selected = this.track['mode'] === 'showing',
9023              track,
9024              i,
9025              l;
9026  
9027          if (this instanceof vjs.OffTextTrackMenuItem) {
9028            selected = true;
9029  
9030            i = 0,
9031            l = tracks.length;
9032  
9033            for (; i < l; i++) {
9034              track = tracks[i];
9035              if (track['kind'] === this.track['kind'] && track['mode'] === 'showing') {
9036                selected = false;
9037                break;
9038              }
9039            }
9040          }
9041  
9042          this.selected(selected);
9043        });
9044        tracks.addEventListener('change', changeHandler);
9045        player.on('dispose', function() {
9046          tracks.removeEventListener('change', changeHandler);
9047        });
9048      }
9049  
9050      // Modify options for parent MenuItem class's init.
9051      options['label'] = track['label'] || track['language'] || 'Unknown';
9052      options['selected'] = track['default'] || track['mode'] === 'showing';
9053      vjs.MenuItem.call(this, player, options);
9054  
9055      // iOS7 doesn't dispatch change events to TextTrackLists when an
9056      // associated track's mode changes. Without something like
9057      // Object.observe() (also not present on iOS7), it's not
9058      // possible to detect changes to the mode attribute and polyfill
9059      // the change event. As a poor substitute, we manually dispatch
9060      // change events whenever the controls modify the mode.
9061      if (tracks && tracks.onchange === undefined) {
9062        this.on(['tap', 'click'], function() {
9063          if (typeof window.Event !== 'object') {
9064            // Android 2.3 throws an Illegal Constructor error for window.Event
9065            try {
9066              event = new window.Event('change');
9067            } catch(err){}
9068          }
9069  
9070          if (!event) {
9071            event = document.createEvent('Event');
9072            event.initEvent('change', true, true);
9073          }
9074  
9075          tracks.dispatchEvent(event);
9076        });
9077      }
9078    }
9079  });
9080  
9081  vjs.TextTrackMenuItem.prototype.onClick = function(){
9082    var kind = this.track['kind'],
